translations: prep.朝；位于……；到某处；到某状态；差；给；对于；比；连着；对着；等于；向……表示敬意；伴随；为了给……；适合；按……的看法；（结算账目时）记入

sentences.sentence: I was trying to save money to go to college.
sentences.translation: 我当时正努力攒钱去上大学。

sentences.sentence: She would like to talk to people one to one.
sentences.translation: 她想和人们一对一地谈话。

sentences.sentence: They come to eat and drink, to swim, to party.
sentences.translation: 他们来吃饭、喝酒、游泳，尽情欢乐。
